nodes.text: The Spur Orbiting Market was an orbital space station that hosted markets and other establishments. After the bounty hunter Beilert Valance was entrusted with the protection of the young Cadeliah by his former mentor, Nakano Lash, Valance briefly took her to the Spur Orbiting Market. While there, they were attacked by a Arcona bounty hunter, who Valance killed with Cadeliah's help. After Valance received repairs to his cybernetics at Slade's Repairs, hunters Zuckuss and 4-LOM attempted to claim the Unbroken Clan's bounty on him. Valance escaped, but with serious injuries and a tracker that had been planted on him by Zuckuss.
